issue.title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
Thanks for the note. I'm currently working with @hsu to get this fixed.

The plan is to release a new version of gazebo_ros_pkgs (or just ros-gazebo-plugin) which will be built against current gazebo-current and would bring as dependency the new libsdformat.
content.html:
Thanks for the note. I'm currently working with @hsu to get this fixed.

The plan is to release a new version of gazebo_ros_pkgs (or just ros-gazebo-plugin) which will be built against current gazebo-current and would bring as dependency the new libsdformat.
